scripts.cypress:live: start-server-and-test 'yarn start:nobrowser' http://localhost:3000 'yarn cypress open --env networkMode=live'
scripts.cypress:capture-v39: start-server-and-test 'yarn start:nobrowser' http://localhost:3000 'yarn cypress run --env dhis2ApiVersion=39,networkMode=capture'
scripts.cypress:stub-v39: start-server-and-test 'yarn start:nobrowser' http://localhost:3000 'yarn cypress run --env dhis2ApiVersion=39,networkMode=stub'
scripts.cypress:capture-v40: start-server-and-test 'yarn start:nobrowser' http://localhost:3000 'yarn cypress run --env dhis2ApiVersion=40,networkMode=capture'
scripts.cypress:stub-v40: start-server-and-test 'yarn start:nobrowser' http://localhost:3000 'yarn cypress run --env dhis2ApiVersion=40,networkMode=stub'
scripts.cypress:capture: start-server-and-test 'yarn start:nobrowser' http://localhost:3000 'yarn cypress run --env dhis2ApiVersion=41,networkMode=capture'
scripts.cypress:stub: start-server-and-test 'yarn start:nobrowser' http://localhost:3000 'yarn cypress run --env dhis2ApiVersion=41,networkMode=stub'
